REMA KALENGA VIRTUAL CHALLENGE
Run with Purpose. Inspire Change.
Join us in spreading the positive impact of running—because every step counts! Be a part of something greater and help shape a better tomorrow, one mile at a time.
Organized by The Raids Sports, the Rema Kalenga Virtual Challenge 2025 offers a unique opportunity to challenge yourself, earn an exceptional medal, and inspire change from wherever you are.


 Event Details
II Distances: 5KM & 10KM
II Event Type: Virtual
II Running App Requirement: Only Strava data will be accepted
II Registration Start: 30 July
II Registration Fee: 800/-BDT (Without Jersey)
II Registration Link: https://form.svhrt.com/687f7e065714352e376bf3c9

A confirmation email will be sent within 24 hours after successful registration.


Race Details:
5KM =Cut-Off Time: 1 Hours

10KM =Cut-Off Time: 1 Hours 50 Minutes

Only 1 submission allowed


 Race Timeline:
Running Period: 1 October – 15 October 2025
Data Submission Period: 1 October – 15 October 2025
Courier Delivery Date: After 1 November 2025




 What Runners Will Receive
* Large, High-Quality China Medal
* E-Certificate
* E-BIB
* Gifts




 Important Notes:
* This is a Virtual Event – you can participate from anywhere.
* Only Strava activity records will be considered valid.
* The registration fee is non-refundable under any circumstances.
* Medals will be awarded only to those who complete the run within the cut-off time.
* Submitting incorrect data will result in disqualification.
* Late data submissions will not be accepted and will result in disqualification.
* Delivery charges must be paid by the participant upon receiving the parcel.
By registering for the Rema Kalenga Virtual Challenge 2025, you agree to all event rules and regulations.
Let’s run with purpose and create lasting change together!

Bengal Swimming Challenge | Barguna Edition
বিষখালী নদী,বরগুনা।
Bengal Swimming Challenge | Barguna Edition
Invite
Details
596 people responded
Event by Run Bangladesh
বিষখালী নদী,বরগুনা।
Duration: 2 days
Public
 
 · Anyone on or off Facebook
The Inaugural Bengal Swimming Challenge!
Get ready, Bangladesh! For the very first time, we're inviting you to be part of an extraordinary aquatic adventure – the Bengal Swimming Challenge!
On December 12th - 13th, 2025, join us in the stunning coastal district of Barguna as we plunge into the mighty Bishkhali River. This isn't just a race; it's an immersive journey through the heart of Bangladesh's natural beauty.
Choose Your Challenge – Distances Tailored for Every Swimmer:
We believe in making open-water swimming accessible and exciting for everyone. Whether you're taking your first stroke in a river or a seasoned marathon swimmer, we have a challenge perfectly suited for you.
* 1 KM - The Introductory Dip:
* Ideal for: Beginners, recreational swimmers, or those looking to experience river swimming for the first time without committing to a longer distance.
* Experience: A perfect introduction to the unique currents and serene beauty of the Bishkhali. It's a fantastic way to test your open-water skills in a supportive environment.
* Expected Duration: Typically takes 20-40 minutes for most swimmers.
* 3 KM - The Enthusiast's Expedition:
* Ideal for: Swimmers with some open-water experience, triathletes, or those who regularly swim in pools and are ready for a moderate river challenge.
* Experience: This distance offers a more substantial test of endurance while still allowing you to soak in the picturesque surroundings of the river and its mangrove-lined banks.
* 5 KM - The Endurance Quest:
* Ideal for: Experienced open-water swimmers, marathon enthusiasts, and athletes looking to push their boundaries in a natural setting.
* Experience: This is a significant open-water challenge that demands stamina and mental fortitude. You'll gain a deeper appreciation for the river's expanse and the vibrant life along its shores as you navigate this classic open-water distance.
* 8 KM - The Ultimate River Marathon:
* Ideal for: Elite open-water swimmers, seasoned long-distance competitors, and those seeking the ultimate test of endurance and perseverance.
* Experience: The crowning jewel of the Bengal Swimming Challenge. This marathon distance will challenge every aspect of your open-water swimming ability, offering a truly epic journey across the Bishkhali River. Conquer this, and you'll have earned serious bragging rights!
A Swimmer's Paradise in Southern Bangladesh:
Imagine cutting through the serene waters of the Bishkhali River, with the lush greenery of mangrove forests gracing the riverbanks. This unique backdrop offers not just a challenging swim but a breathtaking experience. Southern Bangladesh is a land defined by its intricate network of rivers, estuaries, and the Bay of Bengal. With an estimated 24,000 kilometers of rivers crisscrossing the delta, these waterways are the lifeblood of countless communities, supporting a vibrant ecosystem and the livelihoods of thousands of resilient fishermen.
As you navigate the currents, you'll witness firsthand the authentic charm of riverine life. Keep an eye out for local fishing boats, their sails billowing in the breeze, as fishermen expertly cast their nets – a timeless scene that speaks volumes of the region's heritage. The air itself carries the fresh scent of the river and the gentle rustle of leaves from the nearby sundori and gewa trees, creating an unparalleled atmosphere.
Why Swim the Bishkhali?
The Bishkhali River, flowing through the heart of Barguna, offers an ideal setting for open-water swimming. Its expansive stretches and relatively calm currents in December provide a safe yet exhilarating environment. This is your chance to conquer a unique challenge, test your limits, and create unforgettable memories in a truly spectacular natural setting.
This is the 1st edition of the Bengal Swimming Challenge, and we invite you to be a foundational part of its legacy. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to swim in one of Bangladesh's most picturesque rivers and contribute to the growing open-water swimming community.
Presented By Run Bangladesh – bringing you the best in adventure sports!
Mark your calendars! Registration details coming soon.
Get ready to feel the flow, embrace the challenge, and experience the beauty of Barguna like never before. See you at the starting line!

Triathlon Dreamers Proudly Presents: Dhaka Dash 30K – Where Speed Meets Spirit
"One City. One Run. One Legacy"
Step into the heartbeat of Dhaka with the inaugural edition of Dhaka Dash 30K - a bold, high-energy road race crafted for those who run with purpose and passion.
Happening live at the stunning Hatirjheel on 12th December 2025, this event promises more than just distance - it’s a celebration of movement, resilience, and the unshakable connection between runners and their city.


Carrying the powerful message - "One City. One Run. One Legacy" this race invites you to write your own chapter in Dhaka’s running history.
Whether you're chasing a personal best or simply chasing the sunrise over your city, Dhaka Dash 30K is where you’ll find your stride, your strength, and your story.




 Event Overview:


◆ Date: 12 December 2025


◆ Location: Hatirjheel, Dhaka


◆ Event Type: Live


 Race Categories:


◆ 30K Challenge
Not just a distance - it’s a declaration.
Go beyond the half marathon and embrace the next level of endurance in a structured, supported race environment.
 Cut-Off Time: To be announced


◆ 15K Dash
A powerful blend of distance and speed. Ideal for experienced runners aiming for a fast, focused mid-range challenge.
 Cut-Off Time: To be announced


◆ 7.5K Fun Run
A beginner-friendly course designed to celebrate movement and community. Whether you jog, walk, or run — this is your moment.
 Cut-Off Time: To be announced


◆ 1K Kids Run
A joyful, non-competitive race created for children to explore the excitement of running in a safe and supportive environment.
 Cut-Off Time: No Cut-Off Time


Runner Entitlements:


▪︎ Access to Race Expo
▪︎ Official Dhaka Dash Race T-shirt
▪︎ Bib Number with Timing Chip
▪︎ Imported Finisher Medal
▪︎ Dedicated Prayer Zone
▪︎ On-Course Hydration & Support Stations
▪︎ Medical & First Aid Coverage
▪︎ Post-Race Nutrition Pack
▪︎ Digital Finisher Certificate (E-Certificate)
▪︎ Complimentary Race Day Photographs


 Awards & Recognition


Top performers will be honored in the following categories:


◆ 30K, 15K & 7.5K Runs:
Top three male and female finishers will receive prize money and commemorative crests.


◆ 1K Kids Run:
Top five finishers will be awarded special crests and gift packs.


◆ Veteran Category (30K only, Age 45+)
Top three Male & Female veterans will receive exclusive crests of honor.


Important Notes:


◆ Podium positions will be determined based on Gun Time.


◆ This event is exclusively for amateur runners,professional athletes are not eligible for awards.


Race Day Schedule:


(Exact timings to be announced)

Reporting Time: To be announced

◆ 15K & 7.5K Runs
Reporting Time: To be announced
Race Start: To be announced


◆ 1K Kids Run
Reporting Time: To be announced

Rules & Guidelines:


◆ Pre-registration is mandatory, No on-spot registration will be permitted under any circumstances.


◆ BIBs are strictly non-transferable, Running under someone else’s BIB will lead to disqualification.


◆ Finisher medals will only be awarded to participants who complete their respective races within the official cut-off time.


◆ No refunds or category changes will be allowed once registration is confirmed.


◆ Organizers reserve the right to make changes to the race schedule, course, or logistics in case of weather disruptions or any safety concerns.


Registration: Registration opens soon!

“Run Against Noise Pollution”
DURC 10K 2026
Dear Runners,
Greetings from Dhaka University Runners Community (DURC)! We are a student-driven platform dedicated to building a strong sports culture and inspiring a healthier, fitter nation through physical activities.
This year, our motto for DURC 10K 2026 is “Run Against Noise Pollution.” It’s not just a race—it’s a movement for healthier lives and calmer cities. Through this run, we come together to raise awareness, inspire change, and take every stride as a stand for peace, health, and a quieter tomorrow.
The event is open to all, and you are cordially invited to run inside the historic campus of Dhaka University, experiencing the spirit of fitness while embracing the glory of our nation’s heritage.

EVENT NAME: Aftabnagar 10K 2025
EVENT DATE: Friday, 14 November 2025
LOCATION: Aftabnagar, Dhaka
ORGANIZED BY: AFTABNAGAR RUNNERS
EVENT OVERVIEW
The Aftabnagar 10K Run is a community-driven running event promoting health, fitness, friendship and social bonding among runners of all levels. This year’s edition will feature three race categories to encourage maximum participation across all age groups and abilities:
1. 10K Run – Competitive distance for seasoned runners and runners who is looking forward to enter the arena of long distance running.
2. 5K Run – Suitable for amateur runners and casual fitness lovers .
3. 1K Fun Run – Designed for children to enjoy running together.
Come run through the scenic routes of Aftabnagar and be part of a vibrant and growing running community. Let's make every kilometer count!

The Albatross ULTRAIL is coming — your chance to push your limits in one of the most scenic and challenging trails Bangladesh has to offer. With 33km, 50km, and 83Km of rugged terrain, this is the race that will test your endurance and spirit. Named after the Albatross, a bird that symbolizes freedom, endurance, and the thrill of the open skies, this ultra-trail marathon will inspire you to dig deep and keep going.
Albatross ULTRAIL 2025 | ITRA-Certified & UTMB Index Race
 Khagrachhari, Bangladesh**

 24-25 October 2025
Are you ready to make history? The Albatross ULTRAIL is bringing the ultimate trail running experience to Bangladesh! For the first time, local and international runners can earn ITRA points and secure a UTMB Index, paving the way to the world's most prestigious Ultra-Trail races.
 Take on the Challenge:

 33KM Challenge – 890m elevation gain | The perfect introduction to trail running.

 50KM Endurance Test – 1340m elevation gain | Push your limits and test your resilience.

 83KM Ultimate Ultra – 2230m elevation gain | A test of grit, endurance, and adventure!
★Why This Race is Special:

 ITRA Certified – Earn ITRA points for global ranking & future race qualifications.

 UTMB Index Race – Gain a UTMB Index & increase your chances for UTMB World Series entry!

 Scenic & Challenging – Run through the breathtaking hills of Khagrachhari.

 Be a Part of History – Bangladesh’s first step into the global ultra-trail community.
Your Journey to UTMB Starts Here! The Albatross ULTRAIL is your gateway to the legendary UTMB Mont-Blanc —the ultimate dream for ultra-runners worldwide!
Stay Updated & Follow Us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/albatrossultrail
Keep training, stay focused, and get ready to conquer the trails like never before!
REGISTRATION DETAILS COMING SOON!
Don't miss your chance to be part of Bangladesh’s trail running revolution ! Stay tuned for updates, and get ready to conquer the trails!

The 𝐒𝐔𝐒𝐓 𝐅𝐢𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐂𝐥𝐮𝐛 is proud to announce the 𝐒𝐔𝐒𝐓 𝐇𝐚𝐥𝐟 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐧 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓— our first official half marathon at 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐡𝐣𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐥 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐨𝐟 𝐒𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐲, 𝐒𝐲𝐥𝐡𝐞𝐭.
Whether you are a seasoned runner or a first-time participant, this is your opportunity to challenge yourself, push your limits, and enjoy an unforgettable experience—guided by our motto: 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫, 𝐑𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐞𝐫
Building on the resounding success of our 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐮𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐋𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐜𝐲 𝐑𝐮𝐧 𝟕.𝟓𝐊, we are excited to bring the same level of excellence and community spirit to this landmark event.


𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐬:
𝐒𝐔𝐒𝐓 𝐇𝐚𝐥𝐟 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐧 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓

Date: 12 December 2025

THE ATHLETE X ULTRA 2025
 Date: 14–15 November 2025

 Location: Sunamganj, Bangladesh
Organized by The Athlete X


About the Event:
The Athlete X Ultra is more than a race—
It’s a bold journey through the majestic haorlands, muddy village trails, and hidden hill tracks of northeastern Bangladesh.
Whether you’re chasing your first ultra or returning to push your limits, this event will challenge your endurance, test your spirit, and reconnect you with nature.
 Race Categories:
1. 30 KM – Break your boundaries
➤ For those looking to push past their previous limits and step into the world of ultras.
➤ Only 50 slots available.
2. 50 KM – Run beyond the marathon
➤ Designed for seasoned marathoners and those with prior ultra experience.
➤ Experience long haor stretches, muddy paths, and thrilling inclines.
3. 100 KM – The ultimate test
➤ For elite runners who have already completed multiple ultras.
➤ A grueling, scenic, and rewarding course—physically and mentally.
 Cut-off time:
30 KM- 5 Hours
50 KM - 9 Hours
100 KM - 20 Hours
Only finishers will get finishing souvenirs.
Eligibility criteria:
For 100 KM ( two 50KM or one 100KM )
For 50 KM ( Minimum 2 Full Marathons or One 50KM )


 Registration Fee:
 With Transportation (Dhaka ⇄ Race Village):
৳4599 – Includes:
• Round-trip transport
• Tent accommodation (1 night)
• Local food festival (2 days)
• Race bib, medal,running gadgets , and finisher certificate
 Without Transportation:
৳3899 – Includes all of the above, except transport
 Registration starts at 7:00 PM | [25th July,2025]

 Slots are extremely limited
 Facilities Included:
• Dhaka ⇄ Sunamganj transportation (Comfortable bus for full package)
• Tent accommodation in the race village
• Local cultural and food festival
• Fully marked trail route with hydration & medical support
• Finisher medal, event jersey & certificate
• Professional photography & media coverage
• Secure bag drop & runner support zone


 Why Join?
• Discover untouched nature and run along scenic wetlands and small hill trails
• Be part of a growing ultra community in Bangladesh
• Challenge your limits and inspire others
 Are you ready to run wild?
Join us at The Athlete X Ultra 2025 — your next ultra-adventure begins here!

আগামি ৩১/১০/২০২৫ রোজ শুক্রবার বগুড়া রানার্স বাছাইক্রিত ২০ জন দৌড়বিদ ও ১০ জন সাঁতারু দেরকে নিয়ে বরাবরের মত ভিন্নধর্মী এক আয়োজন করতে যাচ্ছে।
এই দিন ভোর ৫:৫০ এ আমরা বগুড়া শহর থেকে দৌড়ে এক নদীর ধারে যেয়ে ফিনিশিং লাইন টাচ করবো,তখন ভলেন্টিয়ার হিসাবে থাকবেন আমাদের বগুড়া সুইমার্সের সদস্যরা।ভলেন্টিয়ার হিসাবে থাকলেও তারা কিন্তু কোনো হাইড্রেশন সাপোর্ট দেবে না।আমাদের নিজেদের হাইড্রেশন নিজেরই ব্যাবস্থা করতে হবে।দৌড় শেষে আমরা নৌকায় সাঁতারুদের সঙ্গ দিবো এবং ফিনিশিং উৎযাপন করবো।
নিজের হাইড্রেশন কিভাবে সংগ্রহ করবো? : হাইড্রেশন ব্যাগে সমস্ত হাইড্রেশন নিয়ে দৌড়াবো।যাদের হাইড্রেশন ব্যাগ নেই তাদেরও চিন্তা নেই! সাথে টাকা ও বোতল রাখবো, রাস্তায় টিউবওয়েল থেকে পানি ও দোকান থেকে কলা/কমলা/আপেল/খেজুর/ইত্যাদি কিনে খাবো আর চিল মুডে দৌড়াবো
ইভেন্টে কিভাবে সুযোগ পাবো?: দৌড়বিদগন Bogura Runners এর সাপ্তাহিক অনুশীলন ইভেন্টগুলো অনুসরন করে লাইভ অংশগ্রহণ করবেন ও বগুড়া রানার্স গ্রুপে শেয়ার করবেন।আর দূরের দৌড়বিদগন অনুশীলন ইভেন্টগুলো অনুকরন করে স্ট্রাভা ডাটা সহ এক্টিভিটি বগুড়া রানার্স গ্রুপে শেয়ার করবেন।আমাদের (গোপনীয়) নির্বাচন কমিটি আপনাদের মাঝে সেরা ২০ জন দৌড়বিদকে নির্বাচিত করবেন।মনে রাখবেন,শুধু স্পিড বা দূরত্ব মানদন্ড নয়।অনুশীলন ইভেন্টের অনুকরন ও লাইভ অংশগ্রহণ অগ্রাধিকার দেয়া হবে এবং নির্বাচন কমিটির সিদ্ধান্তই চুরান্ত বলে বিবেচিত হবে।
সাঁতারুগন কিভাবে সুযোগ পাবেন?: আজ থেকে প্রতিদিন আপনার সাঁতারের কর্মকান্ড বগুড়া সুইমার্স গ্রুপে শেয়ার করুন।আলালুর রহমান তিব্বত স্যারের নেতৃত্বে নির্বাচন কমিটি সেরা ১০ জন সাঁতারু নির্বাচিত করবেন।
ইভেন্ট ফি : নির্বাচিত দৌড়বিদ ও সাঁতারুদের ৫০৫ টাকা ০১৭১১ ০২০৫১৪ টাকায় বিকাশ করতে হবে সিকিউরিটিমানি যা ইভেন্ট শেষে উপস্থিতি নিশ্চিত হলে ৫০০ টাকা বিকাশে ফেরত পাবেন।অর্থাৎ সম্পুর্ন ফ্রী!! বরং ফিনিশারগন পাবেন বগুড়া রানার্সের সুভেনিয়র টিশার্ট

Nuvista "Run for Women" – The Reason to Be There
Women’s health continues to be impacted by a lack of awareness, especially in Bangladesh.
Symptoms of conditions such as hypothyroidism, endometriosis, fibroids, high-risk pregnancies, and menopause are evolving, but awareness remains poor. The women of Bangladesh, across age groups, especially among the socially backward strata are neglecting their health and thereby impacting the generations to follow.
To address this issue, Nuvista Pharma, the first Women-Centric Pharma Company in Bangladesh, is organizing "Run for Women”, a community-focused event to encourage women. This 10 KM run for women event is aimed at promoting physical health, mental well-being, and social connection among women. Women must stand for women. And so should all men, who value women.
This run is designed to encourage women to prioritize their health and inspire men to provide their full support in advancing women's health and well-being in Bangladesh.
There will be 10 KM and a 5 KM category for both men and women. Minimum age has to be 14 years and 12 years to be eligible for participating in 10 KM and 5 KM category respectively.
Race Date: 6th February 2026
Location: Mirpur DOHS area
Race Reporting Time: 0500 AM
Race START Time: 0600 AM
What all runners would receive for the race:
* Beautiful wooden medal
* Race Jersey
* Chip based timing
* Hydration on track
* Post-race meal
There will be Attractive gifts and award for the podium holders.
*Podium will be decided basing on GUN TIME
*Organizer preserves the authority to decide on any aspect regarding race result after consulting with Race Marshall See less

Fitness Meets Accounting
On 𝟳𝘁𝗵 𝗡𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱, the streets of 𝗛𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗿𝗷𝗵𝗲𝗲𝗹 will come alive with energy as running enthusiasts, Chartered Accountants, Finance Professionals, University Students and running athletes from running communities will unite for the Accounting Day Run – a celebration of discipline, precision and endurance, values we cherish both in accounting and in running.

সমুদ্রের পাড় ঘেষে আবারো দৌড়ের সুযোগ নিয়ে এলো টিম চট্টগ্রাম।
হ্যাঁ, চট্টগ্রাম পতেঙ্গা সমুদ্র সৈকতের পাশ দিয়ে ছুটে চলা চট্টগ্রাম সিটি আউটার রিং রোড ধরে ১৪ নভেম্বর , ২০২৫ (শুক্রবার) ৩য় বারের মত আয়োজিত হচ্ছে "চট্টগ্রাম সিটি হাফ ম্যারাথন"।
|| রেস ক্যাটাগরি (২টি): হাফ ম্যারাথন (২১.১ কিমি) ১০ কিমি.
|| স্লট সংখ্যাঃ 1000
|| পার্টিসিপ্যান্ট ক্যাটাগরিঃ জেনারেল ক্যাটাগরি,
এইজ ক্যাটাগরি (বয়স ৫০ উর্ধ্ব)
|| কাট-অফ টাইমঃ হাফ-ম্যারাথন: ৩ ঘন্টা ৩০ মিনিট ১০ কিমিঃ ১ ঘন্টা ৩০ মিনিট.
|| রেজিস্ট্রেশন ফিঃ হাফ ম্যারাথন ১৩৯৯ টাকা,১০ কিলোমিটার ১১৯৯ টাকা
|| রেজিস্ট্রেশনের তারিখঃ ১৯ সেপ্টেম্বর রাত ৮ টায়
|| রেজিস্ট্রেশন লিংকঃ https://tinyurl.com/Registration-CCHM2025
|| সময়সূচীঃ রিপোর্টিংঃ ভোর ৫:৩০ রেস শুরুঃ ভোর ৬:০০.
|| রিপোর্টিং জোনঃ পতেঙ্গা সী-বিচ, চট্টগ্রাম
|| রুট ম্যাপঃ পতেঙ্গা বীচ থেকে শুরু হয় হালিশহর বীচে ইউটার্ন নিয়ে পতেঙ্গা বীচ পর্যন্ত।
অংশগ্রহনকারীদের (পুরুষ ও নারী উভয়ের) জন্য যা থাকছে:
১) টি-শার্ট
২)ফিনিসার মেডেল
৩) ই-সার্টিফিকেট
৪)রেস কিট
৫) সকালের নাস্তা
৬) ডাক্তার এবং প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা সুবিধা
৭) হাইড্রেশন পয়েন্ট
৮) ভোলেন্টিয়ার এবং পুলিশ সহায়তা
৯) ফটোগ্রাফি ও ভিডিওগ্রাফি
১০) পুরষ্কার বিতরণী অনুষ্ঠান
এছাড়াও থাকছে- হাফ ম্যারাথন ও ১০কিমি দুই ক্যাটাগরিতেই জেনারেল প্রথম তিনটি স্থান অর্জনকারীর (পুরুষ ও নারী উভয়ের) জন্য প্রাইজমানি ও ক্রেস্ট এবং এইজ ক্যাটাগরিতে ( পুরুষ অথবা নারী যেই আগে আসুক ) প্রথম ৩ জনের জন্য প্রাইজমানি ও ক্রেস্ট।
|| নিয়মাবলি:
১.সকল বয়সের প্রতিযোগীদের জন্য ইভেন্ট উন্মুক্ত।
২.রেজিষ্ট্রেশন ফি অফেরতযোগ্য।
৩.প্রতিযোগীকে প্রদত্ত রেইস নাম্বার অন্য কারো নিকট হস্তান্তরযোগ্য নয়। হস্তান্তরের কোনরকম চেষ্টা করলে প্রতিযোগীকে অবিলম্বে বহিষ্কার করা হবে।
৪.রেইস কর্তৃপক্ষ কোন জরুরী অবস্থায় অথবা পরিস্থিতি বুঝে রেইসের রুট ও সময়সূচী পরিবর্তন করতে পারেন।
৫.সকল প্রতিযোগীকে নির্ধারিত সঠিক রিপোর্টিং পয়েন্টে সঠিকসময়ে হাজির হতে হবে। দেরি করে আসলে রেইসে অংশ নিতে দেয়া হবে না।
৬.অন্য প্রতিযোগীকে ধাক্কা দেয়া, বাঁধা দেয়া,আপত্তিকর কথা বলা, নারী বিদ্বেষী বা বর্ণবিদ্বেষী মন্তব্য অগ্রহণযোগ্য। রেইস কর্তৃপক্ষ যেকোনো প্রতিযোগীকে রেসের নিয়ম ভঙ্গ করার কারণে রেস থেকে বহিষ্কার করতে পারেন এবং সকল প্রতিযোগীদের নিরাপত্তার জন্য যে কোন ব্যবস্থা নিতে পারেন।
৭.রেইস চলাকালীন সময়ে প্রতিযোগীর আকষ্মিক শারীরিক, মানসিক কোন ধরণের সমস্যার সৃষ্টি হলে তার দায়ভার কর্তৃপক্ষ বহন করে না।
৮.শারিরীক অসুস্থতা নিয়ে কেউ প্রতিযোগীতায় অংশ নিবেন না। অন্যথায় কোন ধরণের সমস্যার জন্য কর্তৃপক্ষ দায়ী থাকবেন না।
৯. দৌড়ানোর সময় বাদে সকল সময়ে মাস্ক পরিধান করে রাখা বাধ্যতামূলক।
১০. শহরের নির্দিষ্ট কিছু পয়েন্ট থেকে বাস যোগে রানারদেরকে রেস ভেন্যুতে পৌছানোর ব্যবস্থা করা হবে।
১১. জেনারেল ক্যাটাগরি ও এইজ ক্যাটাগরি দুইটাই আলাদা, কেউ একই সাথে দুই ক্যাটাগরিতে অংশগ্রহন করতে পারবে না।
১২. কোন সংস্থা বা বাহিনীর খেলোয়াড় অংশগ্রহন করতে পারবে নাহ।
রেইস সংক্রান্ত যেকোন ধরনের তথ্য ও অনুসন্ধানের জন্য ম্যাসেজ দিতে পারেন আমাদের পেইজ Team Chattogram এর ইনবক্সে অথবা Teamchattogram20@gmail.com ইমেইল করতে পারেন।
ধন্যবাদ।
Team Chittagong has once again brought the opportunity to run along the seashore.
Yes, the "Chittagong City Half Marathon" is being organized for the 3rd time on November 14, 2025 (Friday) along the Chittagong City Outer Ring Road running along the Chittagong Patenga Sea Beach.
|| Race Category (2): Half Marathon (21.1 km) 10 km.
|| Number of Slots: 1000
|| Participant Category: General Category,
Age Category (Age 50 and above)
|| Cut-off Time: Half-Marathon: 3 hours 30 minutes 10 km: 1 hour 30 minutes.
|| Registration Fee: Half Marathon 1399 bdt,
10K Run 1199 bdt.
|| Registration Date: 19th September at 8 pm
|| Registration Link: https://tinyurl.com/Registration-CCHM2025
|| Schedule: Reporting: 5:30 am Race Start: 6:00 am.
|| Reporting Zone: Patenga Sea Beach, Chittagong
|| Route Map: Starting from Patenga Beach, taking a U-turn at Halishahar Beach to Patenga Beach.
Participants (both male and female) will receive:
1) T-shirt
2) Finisher's medal
3) E-certificate
4) Race kit
5) Breakfast
6) Doctor and first aid facilities
7) Hydration point
 Volunteer and police assistance
9) Photography and videography
10) Award ceremony
Also, there will be prize money and crests for the first three general place winners (both male and female) in both half marathon and 10km categories. Prize money and crests for the first three people in the age category (male or female, whichever comes first).
|| Rules:
1. The event is open to all age groups.
2. Registration fee is non-refundable.
3. The race number given to the competitor is not transferable to anyone else. Any attempt to transfer will result in immediate disqualification of the competitor.
4. The race authorities may change the route and schedule of the race in case of emergency or based on the situation.
5. All competitors must be present at the designated reporting point on time. Latecomers will not be allowed to participate in the race.
6. Pushing, obstructing, using offensive language, misogynistic or racist comments are unacceptable. The race authorities may disqualify any competitor from the race for violating the race rules and may take any measures for the safety of all competitors.
7. The authorities are not responsible for any sudden physical or mental problems that a competitor may experience during the race.
8. No one with physical illness will participate in the competition. Otherwise, the authorities will not be responsible for any kind of problem.
9. It is mandatory to wear a mask at all times except while running.
10. Arrangements will be made to reach the race venue by bus from certain points in the city.
11. General category and age category are two different categories, no one will be able to participate in both categories at the same time.
12. Players of any organization or force will not be able to participate.
For any kind of information and inquiries related to the race, you can send a message to our page Team Chattogram's inbox or email Teamchattogram20@gmail.com.
Thank you. See less

SHERPUR HALF MARATHON 2025
এসো আলো ছড়াই শেরপুরে।
দৌড় শুধু শরীরচর্চা নয়—এটি একটি ইতিবাচক পরিবর্তনের যাত্রা।একটি ছোট পদক্ষেপই হতে পারে বড় রূপান্তরের শুরু।
আপনার আজকের দৌড় আগামীর জন্য তৈরি করতে পারে একটি সচেতন, সুস্থ ও সুন্দর সমাজ।
চলুন, একসাথে বদলে দিই চারপাশ—পদে পদে ছড়িয়ে দিই উদ্দীপনা ও অনুপ্রেরণা
উদ্দেশ্যপূর্ণ দৌড়ে অংশ নিন Sherpur Runners Community-এর আয়োজিত SHERPUR HALF MARATHON 2025

 নিয়ম ও শর্তাবলী:
১- এই ইভেন্টে দেশি ও বিদেশি সকল দৌড়বিদ অংশগ্রহণ করতে পারবেন।
২- নির্ধারিত সময়ের মধ্যে যারা রেস শেষ করবেন, শুধু তারাই মেডেল পাবেন।
৩- এটি সরাসরি (লাইভ) ইভেন্ট। ভার্চুয়াল রানের সুযোগ নেই।
৪- সকল দৌড়বিদকে রেস চলাকালে ইভেন্টের জার্সি পরিধান করতে হবে।
৫- শুধু রেজিস্টারকৃত প্রতিযোগীরাই নিজ নিজ BIB নিয়ে দৌড়ে অংশগ্রহণ করতে পারবেন।
৬- BIB স্থানান্তর সম্পূর্ণরূপে নিষিদ্ধ।
৭- রেজিস্ট্রেশন ফি ফেরতযোগ্য নয়।
৮- শুধুমাত্র শারীরিকভাবে সুস্থ ও আগ্রহী ব্যক্তিদের অংশগ্রহণে উৎসাহ দেওয়া হচ্ছে।
৯- ইভেন্ট কর্তৃপক্ষ প্রয়োজনে যেকোনো নিয়ম, সময়সূচী বা অন্যান্য পরিবর্তন করার অধিকার সংরক্ষণ করে।
১০- যেকোনো ক্যাটাগরিতে পুরস্কারের জন্য কমপক্ষে ১০ জন প্রতিযোগী থাকা আবশ্যক।
 SHERPUR HALF MARATHON অংশগ্রহণের মাধ্যমে আপনি ইভেন্টের সকল নিয়ম ও শর্ত মেনে নিয়েছেন বলে গণ্য হবে।
আপনার সহযোগিতার জন্য ধন্যবাদ—চলুন সবাই মিলে একটি সফল রেস আয়োজন করি!

𝗥𝗔𝗖𝗘 𝗗𝗘𝗧𝗔𝗜𝗟𝗦:
Saidpur Runners is thrilled to announce the highly anticipated event: the extended and revamped edition of the esteemed Saidpur 10k, now recognized as the Northern Half Marathon 2025!
This exhilarating race is set to take place on Friday, 26 September, 2025, in the picturesque town of Saidpur!


𝐍𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐧 𝐇𝐚𝐥𝐟 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐧:
Following the success of last year's Saidpur 10k, which emerged as a leading running event in 2024, we received tremendous enthusiasm and encouragement from participants and stakeholders to organize a similar event, but as a half marathon. Fueled by this energy and our past plans, we at Saidpur Runners are thrilled to announce that the Northern Half Marathon is the event you’ve asked for.
With a vision that encompasses the greater part of North Bengal, Bangladesh, we have rebranded and are excited to move forward with the name “Northern Half.” In this new edition, the course will be largely similar to last year’s, with an expanded vision that includes all districts of the northern region of Bangladesh as part of the Northern Half.
The Northern Half Marathon will be more than just a race; it will be a festival celebrating runners and a gathering for all participants. This event will honor love for running, joy, tradition, and a chance to connect with nature. Participants will have the opportunity to experience the vibrant culture and rich history of the city, as well as the natural beauty of North Bengal. This occasion is not just a typical running event; it's a unique experience—a celebration that honors fitness, culture, wellness, and community unity.
The Northern Half Marathon 2025 is officially a member of the prestigious AIMS (Association of International Marathons and Distance Races: The home of world running™). This is not just a race; it's an opportunity to be part of a global running community that inspires and motivates runners from all over the world.

Ramadan 7.5k CHALLENGE (season 2)
Date: 27th February, 2026. (Friday)
Event Type: Live/Virtual.
Virtual Event Details:
Record your run/walk any-day from [ 5th Ramadan 2026 - 15th Ramadan 2026] via most popular run/walk/ activity app from play store or App Store, (preferably Strava) and submit a Screenshot using submission link. Submission link will be provided 1 week before event. Also, one needs to submit the result in our group
Cut off time: None.

• T-shirt: Each participant will receive a special edition (Ramadan 7.5k Challenge Season 2) T-shirt.
• Medal: Finishers within cutoff time will only be awarded a distinctive China Medal featuring.........
• Food: Healthy light snacks and water will be at cool down point only, due to Ramadan in mind.
• Volunteer Support: Our dedicated volunteers will be stationed along the route, providing encouragement, guidance, and support whenever needed.
• Medical Support: Safety is our top priority. Medical personnel will be at starting point and u-turn point standby also on bike on track to offer assistance and care throughout the event.
• live-certificate: Will be provided to every registered participants after finishing the run.

Inspiration:
Ramadan 7.5k CHALLENGE season 2, a night RUN outdoor activity.
Participants will push themselves through a challenging busy 7.5 km route in Ramadan, which includes a 3.75 km U-turn, testing physical stamina, seeing who's ahead/ behind you and mental strength running together with mates, colleagues or friends.
Whether you're a seasoned runner or looking to embrace a new fitness challenge, the Ramadan 7.5k Challenge welcomes individuals of all fitness levels. Come together with friends, family, and fellow runners as we celebrate health, unity, and the spirit of Ramadan.
REGISTER, share and prepare to celebrate the night!

Dhaka 25K 2026: Conquer the Capital
Mark your calendars! The Dhaka 25K returns for its thrilling 3rd edition on February 13th, 2026. This internationally recognized race, a proud member of AIMS and boasting a World Athletics-certified course, promises a world-class running experience through the heart of Dhaka.
Ready for the Challenge?
After two successful years, we're raising the bar. The 2026 Dhaka 25K offers a new challenge for every runner, from seasoned marathoners to families looking for an active day out. Choose your distance:
* The Feature Race: 25K: Test your limits on this challenging course and experience the energy of Dhaka.
* 10.3K Fun Run: A perfect distance for intermediate runners seeking a rewarding achievement.
* 3K Family Fun Run: Bring the whole family and enjoy a fun, healthy run through the city. Kids and families of all fitness levels are welcome!
Early Bird Registration: Don't Miss Out!
Secure your spot at the best price! Early bird registration opens on November 1st, 2025.
A World-Class Event:
Dhaka 25K is more than just a race; it's an experience. As a full AIMS member with a World Athletics-certified course, we meet the highest international standards. Join runners from around the globe and discover the vibrant culture and warm hospitality of Dhaka. See what the international media is saying about us! [Link to Media Coverage Here]
What Awaits You:
* Certified Course: Run on a World Athletics-certified track, ensuring accuracy and a professional racing experience.
* Multiple Distances: Choose the race that suits your fitness level and goals.
* Exciting Atmosphere: Experience the thrill of race day with thousands of fellow runners and enthusiastic supporters.
* Family Fun: The 3K Family Fun Run is a great way to get active and create lasting memories.
* Cultural Immersion: Discover the beauty and vibrancy of Dhaka while participating in a world-class event.
Join us on February 13th, 2026, and become part of the Dhaka 25K story!

AKIJ Bicycle COX'S BAZAR MARATHON 2025!
Following the successful organization of the first Cox’s Bazar Run in 2023, the Victory Run in 2024, and the second edition Cox's Bazar Run 2025 along with the Boishakhi Triathlon in 2025 — the Cox’s Bazar Runners Community is now proudly bringing you the Cox’s Bazar Marathon 2025!
Set for November 1, 2025, this international-standard marathon invites runners from around the world to experience an unforgettable race through the stunning landscapes of Cox’s Bazar — from the vibrant town and rolling hills to the breathtaking Marine Drive, with the endless blue of the Bay of Bengal by your side.
Come run where the mountains meet the sea!

Run for Mental Wellbeing
 বিশ্ব মানসিক স্বাস্থ্য দিবস সারা পৃথিবীতে পালিত হবে আগামী ১০ই অক্টোবর ২০২৫।
এই বিশেষ দিন উপলক্ষে বাংলাদেশ অ্যাসোসিয়েশন অফ সাইকিয়াট্রিস্টস (BAP) আয়োজন করছে একটি ফান রান, যার মূল উদ্দেশ্য হলো মানুষের মাঝে মানসিক স্বাস্থ্য বিষয়ক সচেতনতা তৈরি করা।
 ইভেন্টের তারিখ ও সময়:

 ১১ই অক্টোবর ২০২৫, শনিবার

 সকাল ৬:০০ টা
 ভেন্যু:
**জাতীয় মানসিক স্বাস্থ্য ইন্সটিটিউটের সামনে থেকে শুরু**
 রান ক্যাটাগরি:

 ৫ কিমি ফান রান

 রেজিস্ট্রেশন তথ্য:
* রেজিস্ট্রেশন ফি: ৩০০ টাকা
* রেজিস্ট্রেশন শুরু: ৫ই অক্টোবর ২০২৫, সন্ধ্যা ৬টা থেকে
আমাদের বার্তা:
আমরা স্বপ্ন দেখি এমন এক বাংলাদেশ যেখানে—
* মানসিক রোগকে নেতিবাচকভাবে দেখা হবে না,
* প্রত্যন্ত অঞ্চলেও মানসিক রোগের বিজ্ঞানসম্মত চিকিৎসার সুযোগ থাকবে,
* প্রতিটি মানুষ নিজের মানসিক ও শারীরিক সুস্থতাকে সমান গুরুত্ব দেবে।
দৌড়ানো শুধু শরীরকে নয়, মনেরও যত্ন নেয়।
 আসুন, মানসিক স্বাস্থ্যের যত্ন নেই, চলুন দৌড়াই। See less

"Let's all run together on the path of health and awareness...!
Running is one of the means for physical and mental health. Let's run together and spread the message of physical and mental health practices from Narayanganj to all over Bangladesh. This event is not just a running event, but is moving forward with the goal of making it a memorable initiative of Narayanganj district.
We want to convey an important message through this event, the importance of protecting the environment and conserving rivers along with industrial development. Narayanganj is an important industrial and commercial area. The lifeblood of this region is the Shitalakshya River. This development cannot be imagined without the river.
So let's take an oath through running...↓

𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞:

 This event is open to all categories of runners.

 Only those who finish the race within the allotted time will receive medals.

 This is a live event, and there is no option for virtual participation.

 Runners are encouraged to wear the event T-shirt Narayanganj 10Km Run 2026 and wearing T-shirts from other events is strictly prohibited.

 Only participants who are registered can join the race using their assigned individual BIB. Transfer of BIB is strictly prohibited.

 Registration fees are non-refundable.

 Only physically fit and interested individuals are encouraged to participate.

 The event authorities reserve the right to make any rules, schedules or other changes as necessary.
 Get ready to make Narayanganj Running Trek a blast with your participation. Prepare yourself to win the challenge with yourself. Get your running shoes and gears ready to dress up in runner style.
